resources.string: Galaxy US Bootloader unlock
What does it cost?
The price depends on multiple factors, including your device model. Expect to pay up to $150 USD.
What devices are supported?
In general, US S and Note devices from the 10th generation onwards are supported, e.g. the US Unlocked Galaxy S10e or the Verizon Galaxy Note20 Ultra.
What information do I need to provide?
In order to unlock the bootloader, your device ID is needed, along with the model. This will be automatically retrieved for you when you tap the \"Request Unlock\" button.
Can I get a refund if something goes wrong?
Unfortunately not. Refunds aren\'t offered for this service.
What tools do I need for this?
The unlock occurs remotely, so you\'ll need access to a Windows machine. TeamViewer may also be required. A USB redirector tool will be sent to you to install.
Is this a permanent bootloader unlock?

Mostly. This unlock method writes a specially-signed token to your steady partition, which unlocks the bootloader. As long as you don\'t overwrite the steady partition with anything else, your bootloader will remain unlocked. OTAs and stock firmware are safe to flash.
How long do I need to wait?

This isn\'t an automated process, so it may take up to a week from the time you send the request to when your bootloader is actually unlocked. The person who will be unlocking your device is generally available between 4PM and 12AM Beijing time.
I don\'t see my question here. What should I do?
If you have a question and you don\'t see the answer here, come visit the Telegram group.
Request Unlock
